description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up theme management with Provider and rendering the calculator feed into the widget tree. It defines the main app widget, a home page widget, and minimal setup for theme switching.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that manages theme mode and renders the calculator screen.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that hosts the CalculatorScreen and maintains the app bar title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State for MyHomePage, builds scaffold with app bar and calculator widget.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; sets up Provider for theme switching and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing widget tree.
